GeneralInfo.Name: Latest Media Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: cul8er (maintained by yoavain, ajs)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
The plugin basically supports pushing latest added media to your skin.
* latest added pictures * latest added music * latest added videos * latest added series (tvseries) * latest added movies (moving pictures) * latest added movies (my films) * latest added videos (mvcentral) * latest added tv recordings

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

GeneralInfo.Name: Latest Media Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: cul8er (maintained by yoavain, ajs)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
The plugin basically supports pushing latest added media to your skin.
* latest added pictures * latest added music * latest added videos * latest added series (tvseries) * latest added movies (moving pictures) * latest added movies (my films) * latest added videos (mvcentral) * latest added tv recordings
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: + Full internal rework * Fix Music Album folders determine * Fix for Music Play from Latests controls * Optimizations * Bug fixes + Added boolean skin fields (true,false): #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.movingpicture.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.music.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.picture.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.myfilms.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.myvideo.hasnew #latestMediaHandler.tvseries.hasnew

GeneralInfo.Name: Latest Media Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: ajs (maintained by yoavain, original by cul8er)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
The plugin basically supports pushing latest added media to your skin.
* latest added pictures * latest added music * latest added videos * latest added series (tvseries) * latest added movies (moving pictures) * latest added movies (my films) * latest added videos (mvcentral) * latest added tv recordings
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: * Internal rework, optimizations and bug fixes. * Fix for skins with facade-control. * SpeedUp latests music. * Context menu worked on facade and buttons. * Play music worked with (cue+flac etc).

GeneralInfo.Name: Latest Media Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: ajs (maintained by yoavain, original by cul8er)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
The plugin basically supports pushing latest added media to your skin.
* latest added pictures * latest added music * latest added videos * latest added series (tvseries) * latest added movies (moving pictures) * latest added movies (my films) * latest added videos (mvcentral) * latest added tv recordings
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: + Add ability change latests view mode for TV Series (Latests Episodes, Latests Seasons, Latests Series) Configurator and Context menu. + Language file updated + Fix for thumbnails file name + Add jump to Now Playing when music play start + Add properties: #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.latest.[1,2,3,4].summary #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.latest.[1,2,3,4].summaryoutline #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.latest[1,2,3,4].series #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.latest[1,2,3,4].episode #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.latest[1,2,3,4].episodename #latestMediaHandler.music.latest[1,2,3].artistbio #latestMediaHandler.music.latest[1,2,3].artistbiooutline #latestMediaHandler.myvideo.latest[1,2,3].plotoutline #latestMediaHandler.movingpicture.latest[1,2,3].plotoutline #latestMediaHandler.myfilms.latest[1,2,3].plot - always empty - I did not find how to get #latestMediaHandler.myfilms.latest[1,2,3].plotoutline - always empty - I did not find how to get #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.latest[1,2,3].artistbio #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.latest[1,2,3].artistbiooutline #latestMediaHandler.tvseries.latest.mode - episodes, seasons, series #latestMediaHandler.tvseries.latest.type #latestMediaHandler.tvseries.latest[1,2,3].plotoutline

GeneralInfo.Name: Latest Media Handler
GeneralInfo.Author: ajs (maintained by yoavain, original by cul8er)
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
The plugin basically supports pushing latest added media to your skin.
* latest added pictures * latest added music * latest added videos * latest added series (tvseries) * latest added movies (moving pictures) * latest added movies (my films) * latest added videos (mvcentral) * latest added tv recordings
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
New properties: #latestMediaHandler.music.selected.artistbio #latestMediaHandler.music.selected.artistbiooutline #latestMediaHandler.music.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.myvideo.selected.plotoutline #latestMediaHandler.myvideo.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.picture.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.tvseries.selected.plotoutline
#latestMediaHandler.movingpicture.selected.plotoutline #latestMediaHandler.movingpicture.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.myfilms.selected.plotoutline #latestMediaHandler.myfilms.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.selected.artistbio #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.selected.artistbiooutline #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.selected.new
#latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.selected.summaryoutline #latestMediaHandler.tvrecordings.selected.new
For TVSeries - facade control: IconImage - for Season - Season thumb, for Episodes and Series - Series thumb IconImageBig - for Season - Season thumb, for Episodes and Series - Series thumb ThumbnailImage - for Season - Season thumb, for Episodes - Episode thumb for Series - Series thumb
* Cosmetic

GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Added controls: 91919901 - Latest 4 Music 91919902 - Latest 4 MyVideo 91919903 - Latest 4 Pictures 91919904 - Latest 4 TV Series 91919905 - Latest 4 Moving Pictures 91919906 - Latest 4 MyFilms 91919907 - Latest 4 MvCentral Added Spanish translation (tnx XMaM) Fix TVSeries support (tnx Hawkeye) Fix FH compatibility (when FH not installed) Cosmetic

Add: #latestMediaHandler.mvcentral.latest.thumbtype - track | album | artist Add to setting XML file: <entry name="latestMvCentralThumbType">1</entry> 1. Artist thumb 2. Album thumb 3. Track thumb
